item.description:
HEY, ITS THE PATRIOTS, BABY! Gotta root them on!

Join us once again at Four Green Fields pub to cheer on the Pats! It's "the biggest screen in Boston at the longest bar in Boston".

Four Green Fields has a huge 20 Foot screen and a 300 plus crowd capacity. Other places will be mobbed for this game, but this pub is new and we should be able to meetup as well as watch the game.

http://fourgreenfields.com/homepage.php

This meetup will be cross-posted to Social Fun, Boston Happy Hour, & Red Sox Natives.

We are getting to the pub early to get in some pre-game socializing and to make sure and get good seats (management says there will be a "designated area" near the front)!

Four Green Fields is located smack in the heart of Boston and the nearby T stop is State, on the Blue and Orange lines. Parking is available at the Pi Alley Garage on Washington St.

From State T station, go to the corner of Washington St. on Court St. just past the Old Court House. The front of 1 Boston Place is a bank. Go around to the back of this building, on the left to get to the the pub.

The service was great last time. Please maintain your own tab and don't forget TA TIP YAH SERVER!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a hat with a red bike light lit
item.name: New England Patriots Divisional Playoff Game-- 20 Foot Screen
